channel.title: Typo on blag
channel.description: Recent content in Typo on blag

item.title: Errata in Hekaton MVCC paper
item.description: Hekaton MVCC Paper contains a publication error. After reviewing the paper, I confirmed the error with one of the authors. This blog post explains the mistake, the implications and the fix.

item.title: Internet is wholesome: MVCC edition
item.description: This is a short story about how I hit a wall while implementing a database research paper, found a publication error and how people on the internet helped me.
